title: Where Art Thou
description: Search engine web application created to support art galleries within the New York City area, built with React JS, NYC.GOV API and Google Maps API.

title: Supporting Hand
description: Search app that connects the community with teachers who need support using Donor API, built using React JS.

title: Chomp
description: Owo allows user to save money within an social environment with friends and family very similar to an digital sou-sou, built using React JS, PostgreSQL, Node, Express, Stripe API.
